dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6677 IH: Seawall Expansion Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Lynch (for himself and Mr. Moulton) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend the National Levee Safety Act of 2007 to include in the definition of levee hard or manmade structures, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Seawall Expansion Act.
Section 9002(7) of the National Levee Safety Act of 2007 (33 U.S.C. 3301) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), in the matter preceding clause (i)—

subparagraph.text: by striking manmade barrier and inserting hard or manmade structure or barrier;
by inserting , seawall, revetment, bulkhead, groin, jetty, breakwater, dike, levee after floodwall; and
by inserting or soft infrastructure (including a beach, dune, or coastal bank) after other structure); and
in clause (iii), by inserting or after the semicolon;
in clause (iv)(V), by striking ; or and inserting a period; and
